cards.title: Card #1
cards.text: There are two ways to think about a request to delete a non-existent resource

cards.title: Card #2
cards.text: The JSON format is syntactically identical to the code for creating JavaScript objects.

cards.title: Card #3
cards.text: Elasticsearch requires at least Java 7. Specifically as of this writing, it is recommended that you use the Oracle JDK version 1.8.0_72.
